description.value: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

The spy makes two shortsword attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

For 1 minute, the spy magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the spy is Large, doubles her damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes &Reference[str]{Strength} checks and &Reference[str]{Strength} saving throws with advantage. If the spy lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

monsterMunch.titleHTML: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
monsterMunch.fullName: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, or [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage while enlarged.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The spy magically turns &Reference[invisible]{invisible} until it attacks, deals damage, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its &Reference[concentration]{concentration} is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the spy wears or carries is &Reference[invisible]{invisible} with it.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

monsterMunch.titleHTML: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
monsterMunch.fullName: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

description.value:
Cunning Action. On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Duergar Resilience. The spy has advantage on saving throws against &Reference[poison]{poison}, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being &Reference[charmed]{charmed} or &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Sneak Attack. Once per turn, the spy can deal an extra [[/damage 2d6 average=true]] damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn’t &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated} and the spy doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the spy has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
